isis.stitle: 5 SPEED AND 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - ASSEMBLE - SHIFTER HOUSING (FS-6205/6305)

note.para: Interlock balls, detent balls, and springs can be used interchangeably.
Lubricate yoke pads and inserts with oil before assembly. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for recommended lubes.
Lubricate yoke bar grooves with grease before assembly.
Keep yoke bars in neutral while assembling.
Shift yoke retainer holes are not tapped on new shifter housings. Bolts used are "thread forming" and can be re-used if shifter housing is replaced.
It may be necessary to support the yoke bars in position while installing the retainers.

step1.para: Install the interlock balls, detent balls and springs in the following order ( Figure 107):

figure.caption: Figure 107. Install Interlock Balls, Detent Balls, and Springs

step2.para: Position three (3) balls in the reverse light switch bore.
Position two (2) balls in adjacent cross bore.
Position two (2) balls in adjacent cross bore.

step1.para: Position 1st-reverse yoke in the housing assembly ( Figure 108).

figure.caption: Figure 108. Position 1st-Reverse Yoke in Housing Assembly

step1.para: Install interlock pin in 2nd-3rd yoke assembly ( Figure 109).

figure.caption: Figure 109. Install Interlock Pin in 2nd-3rd Yoke Assembly and Position 2nd-3rd Yoke

step1.para: Position 2nd-3rd yoke in the housing assembly ( Figure 109).
Position 4th-5th yoke in the housing assembly ( Figure 110).

figure.caption: Figure 110. Position 4th-5th Yoke in Housing Assembly

step1.para: Position retainers; front retainer in the rear set of holes ( Figure 111).

figure.caption: Figure 111. Position Retainers and Install Bolts in Middle and Rear Retainers

step1.para: Install the bolts in the middle and rear retainers ( Figure 111).Tighten to 20 to 25 ft-lbs. (27 to 34 N• m).
Carefully shift the 4th-5th yoke into 4th gear position (rearward) ( Figure 112).

figure.caption: Figure 112. Shift 4th-5th Yoke into 4th Gear Position and Install Remaining Bolts

step1.para: Install the remaining bolts ( Figure 112).Tighten to 20 to 25 ft-lbs. (27 to 34 N• m).

note.para: Make sure interlocking system is working- can't shift into 2 gears at the same time.
